title: Ambient Video Game Music - Fjords 2
description: Embark on a renewed auditory voyage with this sequel collection of 10 ambient tracks.
longDescription:
Embark on a renewed auditory voyage with this sequel collection of 10 ambient tracks, expertly designed to echo the majestic atmosphere of Scandinavian fjords. Each track serves to envelop the listener in a vivid soundscape of nature's melody, offering an immersive background to any game setting.


This collection captures the beauty of the Scandinavian fjords, mirroring the gentle flow of water, the calls of water fowl echoing across vast expanses, and the occasional soothing rhythm of the rain. Every sonic detail is carefully crafted to paint an auditory landscape that can transport your players directly into the heart of these iconic natural environments.


This sequel collection is perfect for game developers aiming to enhance their in-game environments with authentic, high-quality ambient sounds. The tracks work perfectly as a backdrop for a variety of game genres, amplifying the immersive experience for the players. By incorporating these tracks into your game, you can provide players with a deeply engaging experience that extends beyond the visual elements and into the very sounds that fill their virtual world.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Music Preview 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L4HirEj5_gE


--


Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
